title: French households savings rate 2010 to 2017
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Savings rate, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2013 to 2010.
But, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2015 to 2013.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2016.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2015.
